p.name: Agramonte Memorial Library, Louisiana State University School of Medicine, New Orleans (La.)

bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to W. Branks Stewart, February 26, 1942

div1.p: Hench thanks Stewart for the photographs of the memorial panel at the Agramonte Memorial Library.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to W. Branks Stewart, February 26, 1942
div1.opener:
Y F
February 26, 1942
Mr. W. Branks Stewart
Department of Medical Art and Photography
Louisiana State University
New Orleans, Louisiana
My dear Mr. Stewart:
div1.p:
I certainly appreciate receiving the
photographs of the memorial panel. They are
quite nice and will be very useful to me. I
hope to reproduce one in the monograph on the
conquest of yellow fever which I plan to publish
eventually, and I will of course tell where the
memorial panel is, etc.

By separate post I am sending to you
and Mr. Postell four reprints of my article
“Conquerors of Yellow Fever.”
div1.closer: Very sincerely yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH:as
